title: Skin Shard Re-rolls &  support page problems
body:
Hi so after playing for 8 years I own all the champions and skins, today I rerolled 3 skin shards ( not realising that I actually own all the skins) and it gave me a skin permanent for the apocalyptic brand, from my understanding according to the FAQ you cant reroll into already owned skins, and disenchanting is pretty much useless to me cause the chance of getting a new skin shard that releases that I don't own is like 1/814, it would be helpful that there is a warning that if you own all skins your reroll is wasted or that it disables reroll when you have all the skins as its basically a waste of rerolls, it doesnt feel nice to get screwed for no reason as I basically lost a reroll for no reason as I had trust in the what was stated by riot games 

Also, this is not submitted as a support ticket because even though I'm logged in, it asks me to log in and when I click login or my tickets it does nothing it executes a JS command and doesn't load a new page or do anything, I've tried it on MS edge, Chrome, Firefox, IE 11

replies.body:
For the skins, it will reroll into something you don't own assuming something of that category exists, otherwise it will simply create a random permanent. Players like you are a tiny minority so it's not exactly something that comes up often. You didn't get screwed, it couldn't give you something you didn't have so it just gave you a permanent shard like it was meant to.

There have been issues with login transitions with support at the moment. Generally logging into support via an incognito/private window or logging out of the website (boards) first functions as a temporary workaround.

Ok thanks, I still think it should warn u that you own all skins even if I am the minority, client functionality should not be linked to how much of the base it might apply to just whether it makes sense or not and how costly it is 2 implement,
and while you say it didn't screw mem I respectfuly disagree, it kinda did as it turned 3 skin shards worth 600 gold essences into a skin permanent worth 300 gold essence, that I can never activate and only disenchant and I lose the reroll for when new skins come out 

as for the login, ill try using incognito  but generally if its a cache or settings problem switching browser should have the same effect, if not ill try relogging a few times

Anything further you'll have to take up with support, they may be able to refund you the shards or the essence but I am unsure what their procedure would be.

If you're still struggling with the support site you can also reach out to them on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/RiotSupport
